channel.title: Making a Webclient :)
channel.description:
Hey guys, i'm running PI-317 and i'd like to make my own web client, i'm losing some players because they have to download my new client when I update it. I'm new to coding and have learned over the last couple of months, but i'm still sketchy. Are there any tips or good tutorials you can give me? From a Beginners perspective. :D
Thank you!
